name: Slime Cliker
description:
I make game in Godot Engine.

*This project contains assets from this site. I will try to add links to all the resources used. If you are the creator of some resource, write to me.

Slime - https://reff-sq.itch.io/slime-animations

Food - https://henrysoftware.itch.io/pixel-food

Background - https://ansimuz.itch.io/magic-cliffs-environment

Bullet - https://xyezawr.itch.io/gif-free-pixel-effects-pack-6-forks-of-flame

Coins - https://laredgames.itch.io/gems-coins-free
